casebody.data:
Charles GAINES, Petitioner-Appellant, v. J. J. CLARK, Warden, Respondent-Appellee. No. 71-2483

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Nov. 29, 1971. John W. Stokes, Jr., U. S. Atty., Anthony M. Arnold, Asst. U. S. Atty., Atlanta, Ga., for respondent-appellee.

Before JOHN R. BROWN, Chief Judge, and INGRAHAM and RONEY, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5 Cir.; see Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Co. of New York et al., 5 Cir., 1970, 431 F.2d 409.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1
